perturbation.original_text: "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008."
perturbation.changed_text: "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect at Fox's Discretion."
perturbation.explanation: By changing the term extension from a fixed date to 'at Fox's Discretion', Glu Mobile loses the guarantee of continued licensing rights until March 31, 2008. If California law stipulates implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing in contracts which requires parties not to impair the other party's benefits of the agreement, this gives Fox a means to do so at any time, potentially breaching this implied covenant if exercised unfairly.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing under California Contract Law

perturbation.original_text: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "General Counsel", and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted.
perturbation.changed_text: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "General Counsel".
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase 'and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted,' the contract may be interpreted to require dual notice, both to the General Counsel and to Paul Zuzelo's old email address, even if Paul Zuzelo no longer works at the company. This creates an ambiguity and potential legal risk, particularly if California law requires clear and unambiguous notice provisions in commercial contracts.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Contract Law regarding clear and unambiguous contract terms
